item.scatter.venomfang.desc.0: Upon dealing damage inflicts potion effects on enemy.
item.scatter.venomfang.desc.1: Hold with potion in off hand to fill the weapon.
item.scatter.venomfang.desc.2: Incorrect potion may reset potion effects!
A vessel containing an immeasurable amount of specific potions.
Use in main hand to free potion effects.
Use with item in off hand to infuse it.
block.scatter.soul_brewery.desc.0: This block brews a potion using 1-3 different ingredients.
block.scatter.soul_brewery.desc.1: What is this now, Caves of QUD?
